|| [[[SCP-4002]]] - The Black Moon Howls from Beyond the Edge of Time || [[*user Modern_Erasmus]] and [[*user MayD]] || I love archeology and the fascinating things we dig up. ||
|| [[[SCP-5000]]] - Why? || [[*user Tanhony]] || A simple, light-hearted, delivery job. ||
|| [[[SCP-5720]]] - Astronomically-Inclined Crane || [[*user RJB_R]] || Crane Make Planet. (Formerly SCP-720) ||
|| [[[SCP-7328]]] - Alien Evasion || [[*user Kothardarastrix]] || An understandable overreaction. ||
|| [[[SCP-7528]]] - EPITOMEDIA: The Projection || [[*user Gabriel Kero]], [[*user HarryBlank]], and [[*user Placeholder McD]] || (Read 7555 before this.) An example of excellent Foundation Management. ||
|| [[[SCP-7555]]] - ##transparent|**ATHAZAGORAPHOBIA**## || [[*user Gabriel Kero]] and [[*user Placeholder McD]] || A tie-in to SCP-5000 while telling its own interesting story. ||
|| [[[SCP-7999]]] - Meet Me in the Stars || [[*user OriTiefling]] || A cute tale of first contact and happily ever after. ||

------
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]__INVESTIGATION REPORT__[[/size]]
[[/=]]
__Name:__ Dr. Charley Lucian

__Position:__ Head Researcher

__Security Clearance Level:__ Level 3

__Main Residence:__ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/secure-facility-dossier-site-58 Site-58]

__Brief Observations:__ Appears to be a young man in his 20s. Credentials have held up under scrutiny (for now). Coworkers describe him as "clumsy", but gifted in memorization and an overall dedicated researcher. Attitude appeared laid-back and lighthearted during questioning, seemingly willing to laugh at anything. No major oddities found, but recommending further investigation.

[[span style="font-size: 150%; font-weight: bold;"]][[collapsible show="+ Open Attachment" hide="- Hide Attachment"]][[/span]]
[[div style="float: center; border: solid 2px #000000; width: 570px; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px 10px 10px 40px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
The information you've shown us is troubling. The Hand members we've interrogated have talked about a figure in the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/wanderers-library-hub library] with some odd similarities to our Researcher. While I can't give you any conclusive proof, I can't deny you've brought me an interesting lead. We'll start investigating Lucian, along with this //[https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/sentient-leaves-and-other-stuff Testu-Yuteskon]//, and see if that smug smile of his really is an alien mask.

And yes, I encrypted this. You know how to contact me.
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]
------
> You can do whatever you want with any of my works (As long as it's CC-BY-SA compatible). Parodies, fanart, references in your own work, don't feel the need to ask me for permission, just let me have a look when it's done. Few things give me greater joy than seeing how my work has impacted and inspired others. Should I go inactive for a period longer than a year and don't respond to contacts, I leave my works to the community to do with as they see fit. You can find me on discord as Charley#4825. There's a better chance of me seeing your message on there than wikidot. I have a [https://www.youtube.com/@historywithcharley9334/featured youtube channel] and a [https://www.deviantart.com/artwithcharley Deviantart] page where I post stuff sometimes too.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box |author=Reasonably Psychotic]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box-end]]
author: Reasonably Psychotic
